title: Control of letter-of-credit right
context: ยง490:9-107 Control of letter-of-credit right. A secured party has control of a letter-of-credit right to the extent of any right to payment or performance by the issuer or any nominated person if the issuer or nominated person has consented to an assignment of proceeds of the letter of credit under section 490:5-114&copy; or otherwise applicable law or practice. [L 2000, c 241, pt of ยง1]
